text: Pin (am'makan) avarutan natamatakkutiya (vayatai atainta) potu avar kurinar; "ennarumai makane! Nan unnai aruttu paliyituvataka niccayamakak kanavu kanten. Itaipparri um karuttu enna enpataic cintippiraka!" (Makan) kurinan; "ennarumait tantaiye! Ninkal evappattapatiye ceyyunkal. Allah natinal - ennai ninkal porumaiyalarkalil ninrumullavanakave kanpirkal
